About Me

A brief professional background.

BIO

Hi! My name's Dan. I'm a fullstack (back & font-end) web designer/developer, graphic artist, programmer & photographer with heavy leanings toward FUNCTIONALITY, but more importantly to me at least, AESTHETICS. Most of what i do is heavily influneced by trendy but reliable, industry standard technologies. I try bring to my clients some things tailor made and unique but also consistent with the ever evolving web landscape. I hope to be of indisposable value and service to anyone who is seeking after my skill set. Having ventures and/or projects set up, expanded or even wares that just need the routine "face lift" are all specialties of mine. Thanks for your consideration and hope to hear from you soon.
